Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
Summary: I would've swore this was a falling star but, it stopped dead in it's trail and sat hoovering for a few seconds, shinning brightly, as it started to zig-zap down to the ground.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife, daughter, and I were driving home from Reno, NV near UC Davis on Highway 80 and saw what we thought was a falling star. It fell a very long time, with a very bright long trail behind it. It was falling stright down. Then, it suddenly stopped, and started shinning bright like a star. After about 10 seconds, it started zig-zagging down towards the ground with trails, until it disappeared behind some trees. It was definitely not a falling star. We don't know what it was though.
